Alethia is a metalcore band based in the Northwest suburbs of Chicago IL. Started in 2012 as Jake Farhang's solo project, Alethia soon after took shape as a full band, going through several member changes until finding a solid roster. In December of 2014, Alethia released their debut EP 'Lykaion Falls'. On June 1, 2016, Alethia released their newest single "The Resilient", accompanied by their first music video. Alethia began to prepare a new release in the November of 2016, scheduled for release during the Spring of 2017.

Alethia is

Jake Farhang
Lead Vocals

James Troye
Rhythm Guitar, Backing Vocals

Zach Kosmicke
Lead Guitar

Jake Bailey
Bass Guitar, Clean & Backing Vocals

Danny Springer

For business inquiries contact Jake Farhang.
